parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Conversations

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Register conversation topic to given person. See [[Conversations]] for more details.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Only the speaker(s) need to have the topic added.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbAddTopic]] [topicName, conversationFile, fsmFile, eventHandler]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> topicName: [[String]] - the topic id for further reference

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> conversationFile: [[String]] - .bikb file path

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> fsmFile: [[String]] - (Optional) .fsm file path. Receives the following parameters:
* '''_sentenceId:''' the sentence as defined in the .bikb file
* '''_topic:''' TopicName registered via kbAddTopic
* '''_this:''' the person that was talked to (receiver)
* '''_from:''' the person that talked to the receiver and triggered the script

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> eventHandler: [[Code]] or [[String]] - (Optional) code to execute - given String will be [[compile]]d. This is '''not''' an sqf file path.<br>
Parameters: identical to ''fsmFile'' - see above.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[kbAddTopic]] ["myTest", "myTest.bikb", "myTest.fsm", [[compile]] [[preprocessFileLineNumbers]] "myTest.sqf"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[kbAddTopic]] ["itsGettingWarm", "weatherTalk.bikb"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbHasTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbWasSaid]], [[kbReact]], [[kbRemoveTopic]], [[kbAddDatabase]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
</value></part></template>
